description: From Sunday 6 April, fares will rise in the city for the first time in two years.
title: Edinburgh bus and tram fares increase by 10%
title_page: Edinburgh bus and tram fares increase by 10% - BBC News
maintext:
Bus and tram passengers in Edinburgh and Lothians are facing a 10% fares increase from next month.
Lothian Buses and Edinburgh Trams have announced adult single fares are to go up from £2 to £2.20 while a child's ticket will cost £1.10 - up from £1.
An adult return fare will rise from £3.80 to £4.20. Day Tickets will also increase by 50p, to £5.50.
Fares will increase from Sunday 6 April - the first time in two years.
